website_summaries.verdict: Easy to open and fold stroller that moves smoothly and doesn't weight a lot.
pros: Wheels are smooth and not jerky like some other umbrella strollers
cons: This stroller weighs a little more than other Graco lightweight strollers

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller! This is the 3rd stroller I bought
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller! This is the 3rd stroller I bought, finally everything I was looking for! What did it for me was the fact that lays nearly flat to create a bassinet that can be used with a newborn. My son is 4 months, but we plan to have more. Love the canopy! smooth ride. Only 4 stars since the parent tray is hard to install and it doesn't have a child try...other than that great stroller and it stands on its own taking little space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I love the stroller, but after couple of weeks the brake got jammed and now I can not engage the brake. Today I spent 1/2hour on hold trying to reach Gracie customer service and had to hang up. I suppose I have to return it back.
customer_reviews.author: Marzanna

customer_reviews.title: Edited - Faulty brakes
customer_reviews.text: Like the others who mentioned, the brakes stuck for few times and stopped working completely now(8 months of use). Also, doesnt really connect smoothly with the snugride 35 click connect infant seat. I know they are sold together but this stroller's manual specifically says its not compatible with 35 infant seat. I wonder why they are sold together.
customer_reviews.author: alka anand

customer_reviews.title: Stylish, Safe, Secure, Affordable!!!
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding stroller!!!!! Purchased this stroller for our daughter. It's literally one of the best single strollers we have ever purchased. It's made of great material, stylish, safe, secure, affordable, easy to use. For our family, it perfect!!!!! I would highly recommend purchasing this item for your little:)
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: This is a great stroller, although
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller, although, it has ZERO shocks. I understand this isn't technically a jogger, but having never purchased a stroller before I didn't realize what that would mean. I don't run a lot, so this isn't SUPER important to me, but definitely something I'd consider if having a second baby. We are still using it periodically at 18 months and the only other thing I've noticed is that the wheel lock is harder to engage now.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca D. Sharrah

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller with many features
customer_reviews.text: This stroller has everything we need and more without being very bulky like our previous uppababy, while still retaining all the necessary features like an expanding canopy, reclinability, storage space, cup holder, pocket, and most IMPORTANTLY 1 SECOND FOLD. Folding our old stroller was very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Works well, but broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller because of it's relatively small size and its ability to work with my infant carseat. It's easy to set up and fold with one hand, and we really enjoyed it when we first had it. Unfortunately, after only 5 months of sparing use, the brake pedal broke and the brake can no longer engage. I know this stroller is "lower end" as far as price, but I expected it to last longer than it did.
customer_reviews.author: Kirsten Weis

customer_reviews.title: Finally the perfect stroller for us
customer_reviews.text: This required a review! After a dozen trial and error strollers and three kids later, I found the one that has it all for me. It was super easy to put together, has quick fold, is lightweight but sturdy and not super bulky. I like the straps (although the covers fall off easily) and it has the parent cupholder and compartment, basket at the bottom and a good size canopy for the baby. I couldn’t recommend this stroller more. Wish I had found it for baby #1!
customer_reviews.author: SLH

customer_reviews.title: It is a good short term stroller
customer_reviews.text: We loved our stroller in the beginning. It is quite light, hence easy to use. However, we wished it would have lasted more than 8 months or 4 months since we didn't use it for first 4 months in New England winter. After few months of use, the wheel lock doesn't work, the cup holder keeps coming undone etc. So, if you are considering to buy this. My advice don't expect it to last long.
customer_reviews.author: ASP

customer_reviews.title: A travel stroller we’ll stick with
customer_reviews.text: Great travel stroller. We’ve had other travel strollers in the past and are impressed with this one. The seat folds all the way down, has a spot to basically make it into a traveling bassinet, the cover extends even farther than what you see. Nice features for the pusher to place drink/phone/keys. Kids bar with drink holder is a little awkward and tips drink back a lot, but generally a nice feature to have. When it folds up it is still pretty big, but it rolls very easily making the fact less of a detractor. Just a few of our favorite features, the list could go on! A solid buy, especially for the value.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever!
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is very light extremely easy to fold and absolutely perfect! I love that you can unzip the hood for airflow and my favorite feature is the seat can recline to whatever angle you want it to. Very comfortable for baby.
customer_reviews.author: TBK.

customer_reviews.title: Great for us Grandmas
customer_reviews.text: My grandson is a very active toddler and will take advantage of the slightest moment you take your eyes off of him. I love this stroller. It is actually his second one. The first one was part of the travel system. He outgrew the car seat portion so we decided to give the entire system away and get the single item stroller. I absolutely love the one handed open and close feature. Worth the price and then some.
customer_reviews.author: Corazon Chaplin

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item when it was first launched as I was looking for an affordable, highly portable stroller, and I must say I have not been disappointed. This Is a high quality stroller and compact, which is important as we have both a small car and apartment. I like the bassinet feature and the fact that it can be used with a newborn without the car seat. The seat does not have as much padding as other strollers I've seen, but my son does not seem bothered and always enjoys going for walks. The stroller steering is excellent and it is good on bumpy surfaces. Highly recommend as a more affordable alternative to other jogging strollers out there
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.text: This stroller has held up well the past two years, but it has zero cushion for the kid. I wouldn’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: LisaMR

customer_reviews.title: Very functional for everyday use!
customer_reviews.text: I've never written an Amazon review before, but I love this stroller so much that I felt compelled to give feedback. By the time my child was almost a year-old, I realized what I needed most in a stroller--something very lightweight, easy to maneuver (even with one hand) and quick and easy to fold up and throw in the back of the car. Plus, cupholders! This stroller has been EXACTLY what I needed. I use it everyday with my son to take him into stores, restaurants, the park--anywhere I don't want to have to hold him or chase him, I would highly recommend it for its ease of use and great price point.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Recinella

customer_reviews.title: Took on Disney crowds like a boss!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 6 year old daughter with disabilities to use at Disney. Maneuvered like a pro in the crowds. Very easy to open and fold up. Daughter is small for her age (35 lbs) but she will clearly be able to use this stroller for years to come. Best money spent!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only stroller that should exist
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why anyone would want a different stroller. This is so lightweight and easy to control one handed if necessary, swivels easily, and can handle paths and bumpy surfaces with ease. Not o ly that, but it is sufficient for newborns, as well as toddlers. I would want no other stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Chanjin

customer_reviews.title: Love. So easy to push and steer (even do ...
customer_reviews.text: Love. So easy to push and steer (even do a complete 180) with one hand. Of course I end up holding my son in one arm and pushing the stroller with the other!! They are not exaggerating either with the set up and I'm especially impressed with how quickly and easily I can collapse with one hand. One motion actually, from picking it up by the handle that collapses it while I'm moving it into the van.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller I've had it over a year. It's extremely easy to fold up and take anywhere. The storage is pretty good but I wish the bottom storage was slightly bigger because I tend to use that area a lot. But don't get me wrong it's a very nice amount of space given. It does not take up much space in the trunk. It's also extremely easy to clean I just use a hot damp towel to spot clean. An issue I recently started experiencing was the front wheel can get jammed at times. Regardless, I would purchase again it's a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open and break down, works best for slightly older children
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fold/unfold. Steering is a little sketchy if terrain isn't smooth. Click-connect application was a little difficult to get just right while we were still using the car seat with it but since using it with my son directly seated, it's been a reliable unit.
customer_reviews.author: John J Martin

customer_reviews.title: easiest stroller ever
customer_reviews.text: the cup holder for parents doesn't stay attached very well, but I wouldn't trade it in for the world. I love this stroller, my mother loves to borrow it, she has carpel tunnel so having something lightweight and easy to use and fold is huge
customer_reviews.author: alexandra reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Easy fold and large canopy
customer_reviews.text: I love the stroller it’s easy to fold and compact I like the extra large canopy covers most of the sun and the parent tray is good too it’s a bit on the heavy side when carrying but other then that it’s great
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Great but can tip over!
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. It did tip when my two year old leaned over and she came crashing down into the gravel we were on. She was strapped in but semi loose. Might want to tighten the harness a bit so they can't lean over the edge much. Lesson learned.
customer_reviews.author: RVExodus

customer_reviews.title: Great Stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a stroller that has a higher back and also had an adjustable leg rest and was smaller than our Chicco. After much searching and comparing we finally decided on this one. And it's perfect. Folds up small and is light weight, and our 3 year old (34lbs and 40" tall) fits comfortably. I really like that the canopy zips open to extend it but also has mesh to ventilate. Overall we're very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: German Girl with a Spanish Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it it lays back flat when they want to sleep.... and sits up straight
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice looking stroller and easy to open/close
customer_reviews.text: It's a nice looking stroller and easy to open/close. I like that the canopy extends. I've been using the stroller for 6 months and the rear brake stopped working, which is pretty inconvenient. I think the seat back should be more upright than it is. My baby likes to look around and even the most upright position is reclined and he struggles to sit up so he can see things. I also wish the cup holder was removable since it's just in the way most of the time.
customer_reviews.author: Jena Stugmyer

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller ever
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller ever!!! Easy to use and lightweight. Infant car seat clicks and connects, seat reclines all the way, and bar handle can be removed as well. The only two cons are that the bar handle isn't a snack tray, only holds a cup and its not the best for jogging. The storage is a little small and hard to get to, but we have straps to hang our diaper bag from. My son has been using since a newborn, and we've traveled with it several times as well. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Christina B.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller!! It operates well and provides a handy storage compartment and cup holder for little one and adult. It is very comfortable and easy to handle and open/close. My 1 yr old toddler was very comfortable in it and the hood offers plenty sun protection!! I'm so happy I was able to place the order and receive the stroller the same day just in time for our theme park visit!! It handles like a lightweight stroller and has a zipper in the sun cover to peek in on my son and see how he's doing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... two strollers prior to this one that were not comfortable for my baby
customer_reviews.text: I bought two strollers prior to this one that were not comfortable for my baby. This one was the best one. However back of it is still flat and uncomfortable for my baby who was used to cosy shape of car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Tinatin S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful stroller
customer_reviews.text: It took me less than 5 minutes to snap on the wheels and trays. Very easy to collapse and it rides very smooth. Super happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: J.B.B.

customer_reviews.title: Great, smooth riding stroller!
customer_reviews.text: We've had this stroller for over a year now and have had no major issues! It rides smoothly in most terrains, it folds up well, and worked when our child was an infant with the click connect feature. The only downfall is how small the basket is, especially when you have to decline the seat for it to accept a car seat and when my baby wants to take a nap. The basket is basically inaccessible. Other than that, great stroller!
customer_reviews.author: Wawa

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller! Started with a four wheel unbrella type. This is so much easier to move around, it folds up smaller, is super easy to fold up, and just so worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Candice M. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use & travel with.
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one we have purchased. The first one we used so much and had to replace it after approx. 4 years because the wheels kept falling off. Instead of getting a different stroller, we chose this again because it's so light weight, easy to travel with, and has multiple positions for babies/toddlers/small children to sit in. Love it and definitely worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Christine

customer_reviews.title: easy to fold and open
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to fold and open. The only thing that I am not 100% happy is when I put the carseat on, its click connect but it takes a while to get clicked with the stroller.I wish it connects quicker when I put the carseat on. But it still works just takes couple of try.
customer_reviews.author: disneygirl

customer_reviews.title: Brakes don't work. Received product broken.
customer_reviews.text: Received product and didn't use until my son was old enough to sit in the stroller without his carseat. The brakes don't work. My window to return has closed. I paid over $100 for an unsafe piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Stroller
customer_reviews.text: Baby isn’t here yet but so far I love the stroller! Easy to use, lightweight, and compact. The only thing is that it doesn’t have a tray in the front for the toddler stage. Not sure how much one will be needed then but other than that, looks, feels, and seems to be a great stroller and price.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: This is a great stroller. I have a baby jogger and was going to purchase a Nuna for travel but decided to give this a chance. My child who hates sitting in strollers loves this stroller. It is very comfortable for her and she can sit up far enough if she wants to see around. I have difficulty picking up strollers that are too heavy. While it is not as light as Nuna lite, I am doing fine with it and actually like it better than the Nuna.
customer_reviews.author: Suzette T.

customer_reviews.title: Compact & lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. I did thorough research before deciding on this brand/model and wasn't disappointed. Ordered it on a Friday (9/11) and because we have Prime it was delivered that Sunday! Couldn't be happier. We also ordered the matching car seat. Our son was born October 7th and we use it quite frequently. My biggest appeal was how compact it is once folded (especially in my hatchback Nissan Versa). It stands up on its on and fits into my car and virtually any corner without taking up a lot of space. I definitely recommend getting this stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Yaya

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The brakes broke after less than three weeks of light use. We will be seeking a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Graham

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I love this stroller. It's made mom life in NYC so much easier because of it's versatility.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Omg, I love this Stroller. My grandson still has it and he about to turn 3 soon.
customer_reviews.author: Christy

customer_reviews.title: ... grand daughter for 8 months and it has been great! Light easy to maneuver and putting it away ...
customer_reviews.text: Have been using this with my grand daughter for 8 months and it has been great! Light easy to maneuver and putting it away is fast as is the opening of it up. The only issues is the pads that slide off the straps and become a nuisance.
customer_reviews.author: DRM

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller. Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller. Easy to put together. No tool required. Even this grandma could do it. And it glides through the neighborhood so you can show off your grandchild. I wish they would have had this stroller when my kids were babies!
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller
customer_reviews.text: I loved it easy to assemble, great for walks, and nice space for when baby is sleeping. It went perfect with my click connect car seat I alread had.
customer_reviews.author: Jamaira

customer_reviews.title: Love this stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Handles nice, great shade configuration and incline options. I like the parent storage area for keys, phone and cup holders. Sturdy for bigger toddlers. Has an infant configuration we bought too late to try. Great quick grab and fold. Too big for my small car hatchback, but can take up a passenger seat space in front or back.
customer_reviews.author: m. blair

customer_reviews.title: Great for park walks
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his stroller. Great for park walks, running errands, etc. Light weight and easy to maneuver. My only negative is that the strap covers all fell off &went missing. Can’t get replacements either. ☹️
customer_reviews.author: CBuelow

customer_reviews.title: The best yet...
customer_reviews.text: The best stroller ever owned yet! I am one happy mommy!
customer_reviews.author: Harmony

customer_reviews.title: super easy to drive
customer_reviews.text: super easy to drive, and it`s great from day 1 to 3 years. But the cup holder and the little compartment part on the handle of the stroller keeps falling off, to the point where I just took it off. So annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Alexa

customer_reviews.title: Lays flat, easy to fold, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: We have so very pleased with this stroller. Super easy to fold and open, very light, and I love that it lays almost flat for newborns to stretch out. The only inconvenience is that it does not prop up on its own when folded.
customer_reviews.author: Robert S.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Easy to use with a carseat. Can push and steer one handed. Easy to fold. It seems perfect to me.
customer_reviews.author: Mckenize Chamberlain

customer_reviews.title: I love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. It's heavy duty yet light, turns on a dime, has a smooth ride, and folds up in a second with a simple pull of a handle. The price is right too.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny M

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this stroller. I've worked with children for 14 years and finally have one of my own. This stroller can be steered one handed and out into the car one handed! It's perfect and light. Buy the shade extender! Worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Beck

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Super easy assembly of the product, it’s lightweight and doesn’t take too much space. I do think the wheels get out of shaper pretty quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Abdullah

customer_reviews.title: The best stroller and I bought it used damaged box for half the process. I love Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller, it's perfect in every way and I love the bright Grass green color with the black. I like that it lays down and has plenty of storage. Folds with one hand the car seat attaches I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather stubbs

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller, except crappy cup holder
customer_reviews.text: Love the stroller! Works great not too big not too small. My only issue is the cup holder, its crap and if i put anything in it, it hits my hands or the handle. I bought a different attachment from amazon that is working much better.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for what I needed, does great in theme parks, easy to maneuver. Only thing I don’t like is the cup holder for the baby, it’s too flimsy but it wouldn’t stop me from picking this stroller again.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: It is compact and fits nicely in the trunk
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stroller for travel, since I didn't want to bring the giant jogging stroller I have through the airport. I was able to fold it one-handed (flying alone with a 3 month old), and remove the carseat one handed as well (without the baby in it, obviously). It is compact and fits nicely in the trunk. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amstar

customer_reviews.title: That's said I'm still happy with the stroller
customer_reviews.text: The brakes broke in the first week. That's said I'm still happy with the stroller.
customer_reviews.author: diana

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is terrible and a knock off of the city mini gt ...
customer_reviews.text: Only had this stroller for 5 months and the break lock broke as well as the straps for buckling my daughter in (1 year old). This stroller is terrible and a knock off of the city mini gt which is what i have now and i love it.
customer_reviews.author: Ava

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller with a small storage basket
customer_reviews.text: It is a great compact stroller that is very lightweight and easy to store upright in a small corner of your home. I love this little stroller, but the storage basket is incredibly small, which is the only reason I’m not giving this a five-star rating.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: The stroller worked just fine for the first few weeks
customer_reviews.text: The stroller worked just fine for the first few weeks. It's easy to manoever, stands up fine in the trunk, love the extra big canopy. The basket underneath gives me a headache because it's too small and I can never store much in it, besides it not being easily accessible when baby is in the carseat. But my biggest concern is that the brakes won't work. It's a major safety hazard, I'm not Happy with this situation at all. I read nothing but great things about this stroller and have it my all to be able to afford the set with the car seat and for what, for the brakes of all thing to fail me :(
customer_reviews.author: Katja Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Back wheel lock is not working.
customer_reviews.text: Very bad experience, it’s just 20 days and the wheel lock stopped working. My kids safety is on risk. Can you guys help ?
customer_reviews.author: Hansraj Pareek

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Use this stroller everyday. Easy to open and close. Space-saving.
customer_reviews.author: Laeti

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The brake on the stroller broke after being used maybe 5 times.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this to my daughter for her third child. She already had a very nice stroller but it was the devil to push. Got this one and I quote her”best money I have ever spent on her!”
customer_reviews.author: Jane Stancil

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. Easy assembly, very sturdy, easy to fold, not too bulky and affordable. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Great! Totally worth it
customer_reviews.text: We have a click connect jogger system since we are very active but until it arrived I didn't realize how big it was. So we needed something to travel with and I absolutely love this stroller! Small and compact. We don't have an SUV so it needed to fit in a sedan trunk. Easy to fold!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie S

customer_reviews.title: My Graco stroller
customer_reviews.text: Awesome stroller. It goes all the way down and the front goes up so it transforms into bed. Has huge canopy and the stroller itself is light and medium sized
customer_reviews.author: Magdalena Florida

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Stroller
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller its beautiful and easy to store and fold as well. Not too heavy for me either as I am only 4’11. Gives my son good coverage from the sun as well.
customer_reviews.author: naeli1249

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best stroller ever! I have 5 kids what’s breeze to put together and to travel around with
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Love It
customer_reviews.text: I love this stroller. It is easy to handle. Steering is flawless. Folds easily. Baby is comfortable. The seat also lays flat instead of only reclining to an angle.
customer_reviews.author: S.Turner

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller!! My 4 month is a happy guy in this stroller on our morning walks. It’s easy to maneuver, light weight and provides excellent cover from sun with its long canopy! Exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Amandeep

customer_reviews.title: Nice light weight stroller
customer_reviews.text: Nice light weight stroller. Folds easy but doesn't stand on its own that's the only flaw. Great for around town errands
customer_reviews.author: k. Scull

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this stroller
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this stroller. Am very happy with it. Extremely comfortable and it's fairly lightweight for a stroller. Also easily manageable to put away quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey laya

customer_reviews.title: One major flaw
customer_reviews.text: Very nice stroller but the one I got was wobbly. I was replacing an old wobbly stroller so I sent it back. It would be perfect if they improved the wheels a little.
customer_reviews.author: Angela D.

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: We originally bought this stroller because it was the only one that had a rear axle that my tall husband didn't kick every time he took a step. We have had it for almost 3 years and it is great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but this one is the best. For 3 years old also
customer_reviews.text: I had 5-7 strollers, but this one is the best. For 3 years old also, still can sleep there. Recommend
customer_reviews.author: FACKZSYSTEM

customer_reviews.title: This stroller is great! I love the cup holders
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is great! I love the cup holders, both for the baby and for whom ever will be pushing the baby! Also, the storage underneath is actually Useable!!!! Something my Britax lacked BIG TIME! I paid A lot more for the Britax and was incredibly disappointed. Graco is the way to go...or stroll!
customer_reviews.author: BeLinda Sedberry

customer_reviews.title: Very good stroller! We use it for traveling
customer_reviews.text: Very good stroller ! We use it for traveling, it is so easy to fold and light weigh! Love it !
customer_reviews.author: Artem

customer_reviews.title: Easy to open/close
customer_reviews.text: I love how easy this stroller is to open and close. The only thing I don't like is having to have the seat reclined all the way back before being able to put the infant seat in. It doesn't make getting to the basket underneath very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Breaks fail
customer_reviews.text: This stroller is good for 2 months. Later makes weird old stroller sound and brakes fail which is a safety issue. It should be recalled for failing safety requirements.
customer_reviews.author: Niko Germetya

customer_reviews.title: Great little stroller
customer_reviews.text: Great little stroller. Provides sun shade with pull down canopy, easy to maneuver. We don't use it often, grandparents, but when we do, excellent for the money.
customer_reviews.author: BB1982

customer_reviews.title: Easy to fold and compact
customer_reviews.text: Love this stroller. It is light and easy to fold up. Takes up very little space in the trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t have a pic yet but love this! We had a graco travel system and ...
customer_reviews.text: Don’t have a pic yet but love this! We had a graco travel system and it broke due to poor handling in travel. Ordered this so I had one to travel home with and love the compact and easy-fold features. Great jogger I use 24/7!
customer_reviews.author: David Miller

customer_reviews.title: Break broke
customer_reviews.text: Break broke after 3 weeks of having it. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Unique

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to assemble and I like how it sits up and you can pull it all the way down if your little one is asleep I would recommend and the shade is actually really long
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: but not too little and it is easy to push
customer_reviews.text: Its just what I was looking for. Not to big, but not too little and it is easy to push. The only complaint I have at all is that my diaper bag doesn't fit in the bottom storage basket. Otherwise, a great lite stroller.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ultimate survivor
customer_reviews.text: This stroller stood the ultimate test. Crazy story, but folded up it was run over and dragged underneath a car and survived! Some scratches, tears and even a wonky wheel, but the stroller still rolls and functions perfectly! We love how light and compact this thing is. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: HW

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: I only use it couples time, the break is not working
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Hard to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: I love the design but is very hard to maneuver.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best stroller for the price
customer_reviews.text: Best stroller for the price. All the bells and whistles of the same strollers I pine over but for a third of the price!
customer_reviews.author: Monica C. Morris

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Break on my stroller is not working after 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: Sojan Mathew

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stroller for the price ! Easy to put together , easy to fold and unfold .
customer_reviews.author: K. Mas

customer_reviews.title: Really like this stroller
customer_reviews.text: Really like this stroller! I take it when I travel and I can manage it by myself with a baby in the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing stroller for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: Amazing stroller for an amazing price! Very well made. My son is three and still has room to grow in it!
customer_reviews.author: Johnnie

customer_reviews.title: Great stroller!
customer_reviews.text: Great stroller, very easy to push. A little heavy but very easy to maneuver. Big canopy and good storage space. Feels very sturdy and all for a good reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: ALEX

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Overall great stroller only thing I disliked was the safety belts
customer_reviews.author: Garza

customer_reviews.title: Only a Tray Could Make This Lighter Weight Stroller More Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Easy maneuverability. Lighter weight but very sturdy. Literally one-handed fold-up convenience (which, I admit, I didn't quite believe when I bought it). The only thing I wish it had is a tray. The seat reclines to a totally flat position, which is great if your baby tends to fall asleep while in motion -- and again, it only takes one hand to recline the seat. Plenty of storage under the seat, and I love the zippered compartment on the handle for my phone and keys.
customer_reviews.author: L.C. Rooney

customer_reviews.title: Breake broken
customer_reviews.text: After using for 3 month, the brake broke. Don’t recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: The brake only lasted 3 months
customer_reviews.text: The stroller is perfect except for the fact that after only 3 months of use the brake just stopped working...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

product_meta.title: Graco Aire3 Stroller | Lightweight Baby Stroller, Pierce
product_meta.description:
Color:Pierce| Style:Single StrollerGraco's Aire3 Click Connect Stroller, Pierce, is designed to make it extra-easy for you to explore with baby. The sleek, lightweight stroller weighs less than 22 pounds., so it's easy to lift and carry, and the 3-wheel design is easy to maneuver. It folds with one hand and automatically stands for simple storage. The multi-position, flat-reclining seat is comfortable as your child grows. A parent's tray with zippered storage and two cupholders, and an extra-large storage basket makes strolling more convenient for mom. This baby stroller accepts all Graco SnugRide Click Connect Infant Car Seats with a secure, one-step attachment. The stroller rear wheel size is 9.5 inches and the stroller front wheel size is 6.25 inches

BRAND STORY
By Graco
feature_bullets: Graco stroller folds easily in one second with one hand and features a convenient carrying strap for extra portability
Baby stroller accepts all Graco Click Connect infant car seats with a secure one-step attachment to create your own travel system
3-wheel stroller automatically locks and is self-standing, so it's easy to transport and store
Ultra-light stroller weighs less than 22 pounds so it's easy to lift and carry anywhere. To clean stroller frame and seat pad, spot clean using mild soap and warm water
Multi-position, flat-reclining seat creates an infant carriage for your baby's comfort; it really stands out among baby strollers
